Subskills.name: Sharpened Teeth
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by spirit wolves.

Subskills.name: Wolf Pack
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of spirit wolves.

Subskills.name: Spiritual Rabies
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to become enraged increasing movement speed and damage dealt for a short period.

Subskills.name: Astral Fur
Subskills.description: Increases the damage reduction of spirit wolves.

Subskills.name: Cleave Slash
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius and splash damage dealt to monsters around the target.

Subskills.name: Wolf's Claw
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Ravaging Strike
Subskills.description: Bleeding targets emit damage taken to nearby enemies.

Subskills.name: Pack Leader
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of spirit wolves.

Subskills.name: Howling Pack
Subskills.description: Increases spirit wolves movement speed and maximum summon amount.

Subskills.name: Pummeling Rage
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters back dealing increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Rupturing Slice
Subskills.description: Chance to deal a critical strike on attack.

Subskills.name: Wounding Trail
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Alpha
Subskills.description: Summon a single lone wolf scaling its damage and life according to the maximum amount of wolves.

Subskills.name: Lightning Fangs
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash surges of chain lightning on hit dealing increased damage.
